verses.verse: Now these are they that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, while he yet kept himself <S%H6113>close<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%>: and they were among the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, <S%H5826>helpers<s%> of the <S%H4421>war<s%>. while: Heb. being yet shut up

They were <S%H5401>armed<s%> with <S%H7198>bows<s%>, and could use both the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> and the <S%H8041>left<s%> in hurling <S%H68>stones<s%> and shooting <S%H2671>arrows<s%> out of a <S%H7198>bow<s%>, even of <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And <S%H3132>Joelah<s%>, and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>.

And of the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> there <S%H914>separated<s%> themselves unto <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H4679>hold<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might<s%>, and <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> fit for the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that could <S%H6186>handle<s%> <S%H6793>shield<s%> and <S%H7420>buckler<s%>, whose <S%H6440>faces<s%> were like the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of <S%H738>lions<s%>, and were as <S%H4116>swift<s%> as the <S%H6643>roes<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; of war: Heb. of the host as swift: Heb. as the roes upon the mountains to make haste
<S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H7218>first<s%>, <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>,

These are they that went <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, when it had <S%H4390>overflown<s%> all his <S%H1415>banks<s%> <S%H1428><s%>; and they put to <S%H1272>flight<s%> all them of the <S%H6010>valleys<s%>, both toward the <S%H4217>east<s%>, and toward the <S%H4628>west<s%>. overflown: Heb. filled over
And there <S%H935>came<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to the <S%H4679>hold<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6440>meet<s%> them, and <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, If ye be <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto me to <S%H5826>help<s%> me, mine <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall be <S%H3162>knit<s%> unto you: but if ye be come to <S%H7411>betray<s%> me to mine <S%H6862>enemies<s%>, seeing there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2555>wrong<s%> in mine <S%H3709>hands<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> thereon, and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> it. to meet: Heb. before them be knit: Heb. be one wrong: or, violence

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3847>came<s%> upon <S%H6022>Amasai<s%>, who was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7970>captains<s%> <S%H7991><s%>, and he said, Thine are we, <S%H1732>David<s%>, and on thy side, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H7965>peace<s%> be unto thee, and <S%H7965>peace<s%> be to thine <S%H5826>helpers<s%>; for thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> thee. Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6901>received<s%> them, and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H1416>band<s%>. came: Heb. clothed

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> some of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, when he <S%H935>came<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> against <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>: but they <S%H5826>helped<s%> them not: for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> upon <S%H6098>advisement<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him away, <S%H559>saying<s%>, He will <S%H5307>fall<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the jeopardy of our <S%H7218>heads<s%>. to the: Heb. on our heads

As he <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>, there <S%H5307>fell<s%> to him of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H5734>Adnah<s%>, and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, and <S%H3043>Jediael<s%>, and <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%>, and <S%H453>Elihu<s%>, and <S%H6769>Zilthai<s%>, <S%H7218>captains<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> that were of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And they <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> against the <S%H1416>band<s%> of the rovers: for they were all mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, and were <S%H8269>captains<s%> in the <S%H6635>host<s%>. against: or, with a band

For at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H3117>day<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him, until it was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4264>host<s%>, like the <S%H4264>host<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, which were men that had <S%H998>understanding<s%> <S%H3045><s%> of the <S%H6256>times<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> what <S%H3478>Israel<s%> ought to <S%H6213>do<s%>; the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of them were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>; and all their <S%H251>brethren<s%> were at their <S%H6310>commandment<s%>.

And on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and of the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, with all manner of <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

All these <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, that could <S%H5737>keep<s%> <S%H4634>rank<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and all the <S%H7611>rest<s%> also of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%>.
And there they were with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%>: for their <S%H251>brethren<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for them.

Moreover they that were <S%H7138>nigh<s%> them, even unto <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> on <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and on <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and on <S%H6505>mules<s%>, and on <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H3978>meat<s%>, <S%H7058>meal<s%>, <S%H1690>cakes<s%> of figs, and bunches of <S%H6778>raisins<s%>, and <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%>: for there was <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. meat: or, victual of meal
